recipe.title: BLT Salad with Ranch
ingredients: 1/2 pound slab bacon, cut into 1x1/4-inch pieces
instructions: 1. Cook the bacon in a nonstick skillet over medium-low heat until golden brown. Drain on paper towel. Reserve 2 tablepsoons of the bacon fat.
3. Toss bread cubes with bacon fat, thyme, salt, and pepper. Spread in a single layer on a rimmed baking sheet and bake until golden, 12-15 minutes, shaking the pan once.
4. Place arugula and frisée in a bowl.
